About.title: ABOUT ADVERTISING ANALYTICS DASHBOARD
About.missionStatement: At Advertising Analytics Dashboard, our mission is to simplify the way businesses manage and optimize their advertising campaigns. Whether you're a small business owner or part of a large enterprise, we provide the tools you need to track performance, gain insights, and maximize the impact of your marketing strategies.
About.unifiedAnalytics: Unified Analytics: Consolidate data from multiple ad platforms in one place.
About.realTimeInsights: Real-Time Insights: Access up-to-date metrics to make informed decisions.
About.scalableSolutions: Scalable Solutions: Designed to grow with your business and adapt to your needs.
About.whyChooseUsDescription: With Advertising Analytics Dashboard, You Can:
About.saveTime: Save time by managing all your campaigns from a single interface.
About.competitiveEdge: Gain a competitive edge with actionable insights.
About.focusOnGrowth: Focus on growth while we handle the data.
About.ourVisionDescription: We Aim To Empower Businesses With Advanced Analytics And Intuitive Tools That Unlock The Full Potential Of Their Advertising Efforts. By Bridging Technology And Marketing, We Help You Reach New Heights.
About.callToAction: Have questions? Interested in learning more? Contact Us or explore our Services to see how we can help your business thrive.

PrivacyPolicy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
PrivacyPolicy.introduction: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
PrivacyPolicy.personalInformation: Personal Information: When you create an account, we collect details such as your name, email address, and any other data you provide during registration.
PrivacyPolicy.usageData: Usage Data: We track how you interact with our website, including the services you use, the pages you visit, and your preferences, to enhance your experience.
PrivacyPolicy.adPlatformData: Ad Platform Data: If you connect your ad accounts, we access campaign performance metrics, but we never modify or interact with your ad campaigns.
PrivacyPolicy.provideAccess: Provide access to our platform and its features.
PrivacyPolicy.communicateUpdates: Communicate updates, promotional offers, and support-related information.
PrivacyPolicy.maintainSecurity: Maintain the security and integrity of your data.
PrivacyPolicy.dataProtectionDescription: We implement industry-standard security measures to safeguard your personal information and ad platform data. Your data is encrypted and stored securely, and we regularly update our systems to address emerging security risks.
PrivacyPolicy.sharingYourInformationDescription: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted third-party services only when necessary for operation, and these parties are required to maintain the confidentiality of your information.
PrivacyPolicy.accessUpdate: Access and update your personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.deleteAccount: Delete your account and associated data.
PrivacyPolicy.optOut: Opt-out of marketing communications by updating your preferences.
PrivacyPolicy.changesToPolicyDescription: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
PrivacyPolicy.contactUsDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

QueryForm.selectQuery: Select a previous query or create new

ResultsSection.resultsWillAppear: Results will appear here after analysis

tagDescriptions.Google Site Tag: Google Site Tag is used for tracking and analytics on websites.
tagDescriptions.Google Analytics: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
tagDescriptions.Google Ads DoubleClick: Google Ads DoubleClick is a platform for managing digital advertising campaigns.
tagDescriptions.Facebook Pixel: Facebook Pixel is Facebook's conversion tracking system for ads on Facebook to websites.
tagDescriptions.Facebook SDK: Facebook SDK is a set of tools for integrating Facebook services into your app.
tagDescriptions.Bing Universal Event Tracking: Bing Universal Event Tracking is a tracking tool for Bing Ads.
tagDescriptions.Hotjar: Hotjar is a tool that reveals the online behavior and voice of your users.
tagDescriptions.Amplitude: Amplitude is a product analytics service that helps you understand user behavior.
tagDescriptions.Twitter Analytics: Twitter Analytics provides insights into your Twitter activity.
tagDescriptions.LinkedIn Insight Tag: LinkedIn Insight Tag is a lightweight JavaScript tag for LinkedIn conversion tracking.
tagDescriptions.Quantcast: Quantcast is a digital advertising company specialized in audience measurement.
tagDescriptions.AdRoll: AdRoll is a marketing platform that helps businesses grow through retargeting.
tagDescriptions.Shopify: Shopify is an e-commerce platform for online stores and retail point-of-sale systems.
tagDescriptions.Mailchimp: Mailchimp is a marketing automation platform and email marketing service.
tagDescriptions.Bold Commerce: Bold Commerce provides e-commerce solutions for Shopify stores.
tagDescriptions.Google Ads Conversion Tracking: Google Ads Conversion Tracking helps you track the actions people take after viewing or interacting with your ads.
tagDescriptions.Automizely: Automizely is a marketing automation platform for e-commerce businesses.

TrackingDataPage.title: FIND ANALYTICS AND TRACKING DATA
TrackingDataPage.enterUrl: Enter your website URL to find all of the Analytics and Tracking tags on your website.

GoogleAnalyticsPage.title: GOOGLE ANALYTICS
GoogleAnalyticsPage.followTheseSteps: Follow These Steps To Use This Application With Your Google Analytics Data:
GoogleAnalyticsPage.goToGoogleAnalyticsDashboard: Go to your Google Analytics Dashboard.
GoogleAnalyticsPage.navigateToAdmin: Navigate to Admin > Account > Account access management
GoogleAnalyticsPage.getYourGoogle: Get your Google Analytics Property ID (e.g., 469573948) from Admin > Property > Property details.
GoogleAnalyticsPage.enterTheProperty: Enter the Property ID below, along with the desired date range, and click Get Analytics.

MetaAdsPage.title: META ADS
MetaAdsPage.followTheseSteps: Follow These Steps To Use This Application With Your Meta Ads Data:
MetaAdsPage.goToMetaAdsDashboard: Go to your Meta Ads Dashboard.
MetaAdsPage.logInAndNavigate: Log in and navigate to Business Settings on the bottom left.
MetaAdsPage.noteAdAccountId: Note your Ad Account ID on the top left drop down.
MetaAdsPage.underAccountsApps: Under Accounts > Apps > Add and create an App if you have not created one already.
MetaAdsPage.navigateToUsers: Navigate to Users > System Users > Add and create an admin system user with access to your app and any other assets if you have not created one.
MetaAdsPage.retrieveAccessToken: Retrieve your access token for the system user by clicking Generate Token with the maximum permissions.
MetaAdsPage.enterAdAccountId: Enter your Ad Account ID and Access Token below, along with the desired date range, and click Get Analytics.

MicrosoftAdsPage.title: MICROSOFT ADS
MicrosoftAdsPage.followTheseSteps: Follow These Steps To Use This Application With Your Microsoft Ads Data:
MicrosoftAdsPage.clickConnect: Click Connect with Microsoft Ads and select your Microsoft account associated with your Microsoft Ads account. If the pop-up is blocked, click the pop-up icon on the next to the address bar.
MicrosoftAdsPage.logInToMicrosoft: Log in to Microsoft Ads Dashboard and select your Microsoft Ads Account.
MicrosoftAdsPage.clickTheCampaigns: Click the Campaigns tab on the left and get your Account ID (e.g., 138753866) and your Customer ID (e.g., 253842102) listed in the URL after 'aid=' and 'cid=' respectively along with the desired date range, and click Analyze.

GoogleAdsPage.title: GOOGLE ADS
GoogleAdsPage.followTheseSteps: Follow These Steps To Use This Application With Your Google Ads Data:
GoogleAdsPage.clickConnect: Click Connect with Google Ads and select your Google account associated with your Google Ads account. If the pop-up is blocked, click the pop-up icon on the next to the address bar.
GoogleAdsPage.logInToGoogle: Log in to Google Ads Dashboard and select your Google Ads Account.
GoogleAdsPage.getYourCustomerId: Get your Customer ID from the top right (e.g., 683-961-6266) for the account that you would like to fetch data from.
GoogleAdsPage.enterYourCustomerId: Enter your customer ID below, along with the desired date range, and click Analyze.
